Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time spent in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time between Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in rework loops
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER when followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total elapsed time from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to the subsequent Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in successful re-submission paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to occur after case start in variants involving pre-approval
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that eventually reach Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in variants where pre-approval is required
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Time from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Request Payment in successful end-to-end variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to be followed by a new Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE compared to the time it takes Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION to be followed by a new Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time between Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in rework-containing variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum cycle time of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER versus Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR in comparable rejection-rework patterns
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average duration of the entire variant segment starting at Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and ending at Payment Handled, compared to segments starting at Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Time from case start until Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in domestic declaration reimbursement cases versus pre-paid travel cost cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case
